string.text:
Fresh, ready-to-drink UCC Cold Brew coffee for a refreshing stamina boost without the need for preparation. Often enjoyed for its convenience and revitalizing effect.

 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Drink

 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Alcohol Sobering Effect
